column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD:
column4: All outbound lanes are shutdown at Kirklevington Dr due to a serious collision at Gainesway Dr.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD:
column4: Outbound traffic is being diverted to Kirklevington Dr toward Redding Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD:
column4: The outer loop exit ramp from New Circle Rd to Tates Creek is also shutdown.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD:
column4: Motorists should avoid this area if possible.
Currently in effect and until 8:00 p.m. EDT.
